IRS990.Desc: ORGANIZATION SUPPORTS APPROXIMATELY 50 ORGANIZATIONS IN THEIR CHARITABLE GOALS

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: BRIDGE OF PENN YORK VALLEY CHURCHES

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: UNITED WAY DISTRIBUTES FUNDS TO ORGANIZATIONS FOR PROGRAMS THAT MEET COMMUNITY NEEDS. THE ORGANIZATIONS REQUEST FUNDING FOR THEIR PROGRAMS AND THE UNITED WAY SENDS OUT A LETTER TO THE ORGANIZATION LISTING THE AMOUNT THEY ARE ABLE TO DISTRIBUTE TO THEM BASED ON FUNDING RECEIVED THROUGH THEIR ANNUAL CAMPAIGN AND BOARD APPROVAL.
BOARD MEETS AND DISCUSSES THESE ISSUES
